about_the_game:
"Willy and Rosie: Bust out of the Big House" is a rage-platformer about giving the old ball and chain the honeymoon she deserves. Celebrate their love by taking them out of jail and into their honeymoon! Test your mastery of throwing by become the ultimate escape artist in this extremely difficult platforming game.

Gameplay

Every throw is critical
The higher you climb the harder you fall. Each time you let go of Rosie, nail biting ensues.

Throw carefully
Each throw is a carefully calculated interaction between the physics system, calculation and your best judgement.

The path to success ain't always the same
Find your fastest path to the top and compete with yourself to see if you can climb faster and faster. The game is speed running friendly

World of wonder

Throw your way through 50 levels in 5 different Looney Tunes inspired biomes and say hello to all the fully voiced weird characters that live there. All accompanied by the incredible "Willy and Rosie: Bust out of the Big House" soundtrack.


Give Rosie the honeymoon she's always deserved!

name: Willy and Rosie: Bust Out of the Big House

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GhZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: A rage quit platformer set in a cartoony world. Meet weird and funny characters as you throw yourself upward on the long journey to give your Ball and Chain the honeymoon she deserves.
